title: Angela Richardson – 2022 Comments on Solar Farm Planning Applications
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Angela Richardson, the Conservative MP for Guildford, on Twitter on 10 October 2022.
content:
There is a planning application for a solar farm in my constituency which I support as it will help my local University meet its net zero aims by 2030. A blanket ban on solar farms would be unwise. Should be looked at on a case by case basis.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
